<script>
(function() {
  function addTimestamps() {
    fetch('files/file_timestamps.json')
      .then(response => {
        if (!response.ok) return null;
        return response.json();
      })
      .then(data => {
        if (!data || !data.files) return;

        // Process problem sets table (table with "Problem Set" in first column)
        document.querySelectorAll('table').forEach(table => {
          const rows = Array.from(table.querySelectorAll('tbody tr'));

          rows.forEach(row => {
            const firstCell = row.querySelector('td:first-child');
            if (!firstCell || !firstCell.textContent.includes('Problem Set')) return;
            if (row.nextElementSibling && row.nextElementSibling.classList.contains('last-updated-row')) return;

            const cells = row.querySelectorAll('td');
            const timestamps = [];
            let hasAnyTimestamp = false;

            cells.forEach((cell, idx) => {
              if (idx === 0) {
                timestamps.push('Last updated');
                return;
              }
              const link = cell.querySelector('a[href*="files/"]');
              if (link) {
                const href = link.getAttribute('href');
                const path = href.replace(/^.*?(files\/)/, '$1');
                const timestamp = data.files[path];
                if (timestamp) {
                  hasAnyTimestamp = true;
                  const date = new Date(timestamp);
                  const formatted = date.toLocaleDateString('en-US', {
                    month: 'short',
                    day: 'numeric'
                  });
                  timestamps.push(formatted);
                } else {
                  timestamps.push('');
                }
              } else {
                timestamps.push('');
              }
            });

            if (hasAnyTimestamp) {
              row.classList.add('has-updated-row');
              const newRow = document.createElement('tr');
              newRow.className = 'last-updated-row';
              timestamps.forEach((text, idx) => {
                const td = document.createElement('td');
                td.textContent = text;
                if (idx === 0) td.className = 'last-updated-label';
                else td.className = 'last-updated-date';
                newRow.appendChild(td);
              });
              row.parentNode.insertBefore(newRow, row.nextSibling);
            }
          });
        });

        // Process other links (slides, lecture notes) with inline dates
        document.querySelectorAll('a[href*="files/"]').forEach(link => {
          // Skip links in problem sets table (they have row-based dates)
          const inPsetTable = link.closest('tr')?.querySelector('td:first-child')?.textContent.includes('Problem Set');
          if (inPsetTable) return;

          if (link.nextSibling && link.nextSibling.className === 'file-updated') return;
          const href = link.getAttribute('href');
          const path = href.replace(/^.*?(files\/)/, '$1');
          const timestamp = data.files[path];
          if (timestamp) {
            const date = new Date(timestamp);
            const formatted = date.toLocaleDateString('en-US', {
              month: 'short',
              day: 'numeric'
            });
            const span = document.createElement('span');
            span.className = 'file-updated';
            span.textContent = ` (upd. ${formatted})`;
            link.parentNode.insertBefore(span, link.nextSibling);
          }
        });
      })
      .catch(err => console.error('Timestamp fetch error:', err));
  }

  if (document.readyState === 'loading') {
    document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', addTimestamps);
  } else {
    addTimestamps();
  }
})();
</script>

.file-updated {
  color: #6c757d;
  font-size: 0.85em;
}

}

  font-size: 0.85em;
}
.last-updated-row td {
  padding-top: 0 !important;
  padding-bottom: 0.75em !important;
}
.last-updated-label {
  color: #6c757d;
  font-style: italic;
}
.last-updated-date {
  color: #6c757d;
}
</style>
